text: (ṣuayib nabiva api apagē dūtayā vaśayen yævū avasthāvēdī) ohugē janatāvagen uṅagu vū pradhānīn (ohuṭa) “ō ṣuayib!oba apagē dharmayaṭa nohæruṇahot niyata vaśayenma api obavada, oba samaga vū viśvāsavantayinvada, apagē raṭin eḷavā damannemu” yayi pavæsūha. eyaṭa ohu, (ovunṭa “obagē dharmaya) api piḷikul kaḷā vuvada?”yi vimasuvēya
